imdb.plot outline: Two factions of powerful androids had risen a long time ago, right after the extinction of human race. Androids- Mechs and Synths have taken over human existence. A small group of humans survived an apocalypse and are still alive up until this day. However, their whereabouts are unknown. One faction of the androids is still under human commands. The other one had programmed itself a long time ago to annihilate everything that is biological, claiming that they escaped from human-caused slavery. The cosmic battle and terror continue to quake the universe as more and more extraterrestrials become involved in this long-lasting conflict.
imdb.title: Mechs
plot: Two factions of powerful androids had risen a long time ago, right after the extinction of human race. Androids- _Mechs_ (qv) and Synths have taken over human existence. A small group of humans survived an apocalypse and are still alive up until this day. However, their whereabouts are unknown. One faction of the androids is still under human commands. The other one had programmed itself a long time ago to annihilate everything that is biological, claiming that they escaped from human-caused slavery. The cosmic battle and terror continue to quake the universe as more and more extraterrestrials become involved in this long-lasting conflict.
